

.. _sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_02-tips-n-tricks:

Miscellaneous examples
======================
这些示例演示了使用 PyMAPDL 的各种技巧。



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="该示例演示了如何添加新示例，同时也是创建示例时可使用的模板。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/02-tips-n-tricks/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-example-template_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_02-tips-n-tricks_00-example-template.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">添加一个新的 Gallery Example</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本例向您展示如何使用 PyMAPDL 控制网格密度。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/02-tips-n-tricks/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-smoothing-element-size-transitions_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_02-tips-n-tricks_01-smoothing-element-size-transitions.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">MAPDL 单元尺寸转换示例</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本例向您展示如何使用 PyMAPDL 中的内联函数（Inline Functions）。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/02-tips-n-tricks/images/thumb/sphx_glr_03-using_inline_functions_and_Query_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_02-tips-n-tricks_03-using_inline_functions_and_Query.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">使用内联函数（Query）</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="在本例中，我们将展示如何处理壳体和旋转位移。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/02-tips-n-tricks/images/thumb/sphx_glr_04-rotational-displacement_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_02-tips-n-tricks_04-rotational-displacement.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">生成和提取旋转位移</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本教程将演示如何探索 MAPDL 会话生成的二进制文件内容并提取相关记录。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/02-tips-n-tricks/images/thumb/sphx_glr_05-explore_mapdl_files_thumb.png

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">二进制 MAPDL 文件资源管理器</div>
    </div>

    </div>
